bio: Everett McKay is the principal of [UX Design Edge](http://www.uxdesignedge.com/), a user experience design consulting and training firm specializing in helping non-designers based in St. Albans. Previously, he was a program manager at Microsoft on the Windows 7 and Windows Vista teams, and was responsible for the [Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa511258.aspx).
